rows.4: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

%%pyspark
import pandas as pd
blob_account_name = "strgpmishra"
blob_container_name = "raw"
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("AzureBlobStorage1")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)
df = spark.read.load('wasbs://raw@strgpmishra.blob.core.windows.net/Country_Rollup.csv', format='csv'
## Ifheaderexistsuncommentlinebelow
, header=True
)
df = df.na.fill("")
# Or using fillna
df = df.fillna("")
display(df)

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date, date_add
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# Initialize SparkSession (assuming you have already done this; if not, uncomment the next two lines)
# spark = SparkSession.builder \
#     .appName("Date Issue Fix") \
#     .getOrCreate()

# Corrected sample data as a list of tuples
data = [("2023-03-31",), ("2022-03-31",)]  

# Define schema
schema = StructType([ 
    StructField("FiscalPeriodEndDate", StringType(), True)
])

# Create DataFrame with the correct structure
df = spark.createDataFrame(data, schema)
df.createOrReplaceTempView("TempTable_FiscalPeriod")

df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriod")
df.show()

# Using date_add for date arithmetic
DF_StartEndDates = spark.sql("""
    SELECT 
      date_add(CAST(MIN(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS DATE), 1) AS FiscalStartDate,  
      date_add(CAST(MAX(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS DATE), 1) AS FiscalEndDate
    FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriod
""")

DF_StartEndDates.show()

#Create List from DF_StartEndDates
DatesCollection = DF_StartEndDates.collect()

#Generate Date Ranges from Start & End Dates 
def DimDate_PeriodInDaysDateRange(start_date, end_date):
    for n in range(int((end_date - start_date).days)):
        yield start_date + timedelta(n)

#Initialize list to store dates between Start & End Date
List_DimDatePeriodInDaysDates = []

#Loop in DatesCollection and generate all days between Start & End Date
for row in DatesCollection:
    PeriodInDaysStartDate = row["FiscalStartDate"]
    PeriodInDaysEndDate =  row["FiscalEndDate"]
    for single_date in DimDate_PeriodInDaysDateRange(PeriodInDaysStartDate, PeriodInDaysEndDate):
        #Append single days to Period In Days Dates List
        List_DimDatePeriodInDaysDates.append(single_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

#Define the Dataframe from Period In Days Dates List
DF_PeriodInDaysDates = spark.createDataFrame(List_DimDatePeriodInDaysDates, StringType())
DF_PeriodInDaysDates.createOrReplaceTempView('FiscalDates')


# Define HistoricalCalendar as "Gregorian" for the United Kingdom calendar
HistoricalCalendar = "Gregorian"

GenDates = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT 
        date_add(CAST(MIN(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS DATE), 1) AS FiscalPeriodStartDate,
        date_add(CAST(MAX(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS DATE), 1) AS FiscalPeriodEndDate,
        '{HistoricalCalendar}' AS Calendar,
        YEAR(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS FiscalYear,
        CONCAT('Period ', month(FiscalPeriodEndDate)) AS PeriodName,
        MONTH(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS FiscalMonth,
        CASE 
            WHEN MONTH(FiscalPeriodEndDate) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN 1
            WHEN MONTH(FiscalPeriodEndDate) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN 2
            WHEN MONTH(FiscalPeriodEndDate) BETWEEN 7 AND 9 THEN 3
            ELSE 4
        END AS FiscalQuarter,
        1 AS Type,
        current_timestamp() AS SyncStartDateTime
    FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriod
    GROUP BY FiscalYear, PeriodName, FiscalMonth, FiscalQuarter
""")
# Register the Temp Table
GenDates.createOrReplaceTempView("TempTable_FiscalPeriodAdditionalDates")

# df_dates = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriodAdditionalDates")
# df_dates.show()

# Define the Dataframe
DF_Calendar = spark.sql(f"""SELECT  
                                '-1' AS DateCode,
                                to_date('1900-01-01') AS Date,
                                to_date('1989-01-01') AS PreviousYearDate,
                                '190001' AS CalendarPeriod,
                                'Monday, January 1 1900' AS DateName,
                                '1900' AS CalendarYear,
                                'Year 1900' AS CalendarYearName,
                                '1900-Q1' AS CalendarQuarter,
                                'Quarter 1, 1900' AS CalendarQuarterName,
                                '01' AS CalendarMonth,
                                'January' AS MonthShortName,
                                'January, 1900' AS CalendarMonthName,
                                '01' AS CalendarWeek,
                                'Week 01, 1900' AS CalendarWeekName,
                                '001' AS CalendarDayOfYear,
                                'Day 001, 1900' AS CalendarDayOfYearName,
                                '01' AS DayOfMonth,
                                'Day 01' AS DayOfMonthName,
                                '1' AS DayOfWeek,
                                'Day 1' AS DayOfWeekName,
                                'Monday' AS Weekday,
                                '1900, 01' AS CalendarWeekOfYear,
                                'Week 01, 1900' AS CalendarWeekOfYearName,
                                '1900, 01' AS CalendarMonthOfYear,
                                'Month 01, 1900' AS CalendarMonthOfYearName,
                                '1900, 1' AS CalendarQuarterOfYear,
                                'Quarter 1, 1900' AS CalendarQuarterOfYearName,
                                '1900-H1' AS CalendarHalfYear,
                                '190001' AS FiscalPeriod,
                                '1900' AS FiscalYear,
                                'Fiscal Year 1900' AS FiscalYearName,
                                '1900-Q1' AS FiscalQuarter,
                                'Fiscal Quarter 1, 1900' AS FiscalQuarterName,
                                '01' AS FiscalMonth,
                                'January, 1900' AS FiscalMonthName,
                                '1900-H1' AS FiscalHalfYear,
                                '' AS Calendar
                        UNION ALL
                        SELECT  Calendar.DateCode,
                                to_date(Calendar.Date) AS Date,
                                ADD_MONTHS(to_date(Calendar.Date),-12) AS PreviousYearDate,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'),date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MM')) AS CalendarPeriod,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'EEEE'), ", " ,date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM'), " "  , date_format(Calendar.Date, 'd'),  " " , date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS DateName,
                                date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y') AS CalendarYear,
                                CONCAT("Year ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarYearName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), '-Q', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q')) AS CalendarQuarter,
                                CONCAT("Quarter ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarQuarterName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0',date_format(Calendar.Date, 'M')),2) AS CalendarMonth,
                                date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM') AS MonthShortName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y') ) AS CalendarMonthName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2) AS CalendarWeek,
                                CONCAT("Week ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2), ", ",date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarWeekName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('00', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'D')),3) AS CalendarDayOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Day ", RIGHT(CONCAT('00', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'D')),3), ", ",date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarDayOfYearName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'd')),2) AS DayOfMonth,
                                CONCAT("Day ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'd')),2)) AS DayOfMonthName,
                                dayofweek(Calendar.Date) AS DayOfWeek,
                                CONCAT("Day ",dayofweek(Calendar.Date)) AS DayOfWeekName,
                                date_format(Calendar.Date, 'EEEE') AS Weekday,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'),', ',RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2)) AS CalendarWeekOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Week ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2), ", " ,date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarWeekOfYearName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), ", ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0',date_format(Calendar.Date, 'M')),2)) AS CalendarMonthOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Month ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0',date_format(Calendar.Date, 'M')),2), ", ",date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y') ) AS CalendarMonthOfYearName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q')) AS CalendarQuarterOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Quarter ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarQuarterOfYearName,
                                CASE 
                                    WHEN int(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q')) < 3
                                    THEN CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), '-H1')
                                    ELSE CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), '-H2')
                                END AS CalendarHalfYear,
                                CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), right(CONCAT('0',FPO.FiscalMonth),2)) AS FiscalPeriod,
                                RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4) AS FiscalYear,
                                CONCAT("Fiscal Year ", RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4)) AS FiscalYearName,
                                CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), '-Q', FPO.FiscalQuarter ) AS FiscalQuarter,
                                CONCAT("Fiscal Quarter ", FPO.FiscalQuarter, ", ", RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4)) AS FiscalQuarterName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0', FPO.FiscalMonth),2) AS FiscalMonth,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM'),", ", RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4)) AS FiscalMonthName,
                                CASE 
                                    WHEN FPO.FiscalQuarter < 3
                                    THEN CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), '-H1')
                                    ELSE CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), '-H2')
                                END AS FiscalHalfYear,
                                Calendar.Calendar AS Calendar
                        FROM 
                            (SELECT CONCAT(FPI.CALENDAR, '_' ,FD.value) AS DateCode,
                                    FPI.CALENDAR,
                                    FPI.FISCALYEAR,
                                    FD.value AS Date
                             FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriodAdditionalDates FPI
                             CROSS JOIN FiscalDates FD
                             WHERE FD.Value BETWEEN FPI.FiscalPeriodStartDate AND FPI.FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS Calendar
                             LEFT JOIN TempTable_FiscalPeriodAdditionalDates FPO
                                  ON Calendar.Date BETWEEN FPO.FiscalPeriodStartDate AND FPO.FiscalPeriodEndDate
                                  AND Calendar.Calendar = FPO.Calendar
                        """)

DF_Calendar.createOrReplaceTempView("TempTable_FiscalPeriodCalender")
df_calender = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriodCalender")
# df_calender.show()
display(df_calender)

# #Write cleansed data
# DF_Calendar.write.format("delta")\
#                  .mode("overwrite")\
#                  .option("overwriteSchema", "false")\
#                  .save(CuratedADLSPath)

# #Display Dataframe Result
# if Debug == True:
#     print("Total Records: " + str(DF_Calendar.count()))
#     display(DF_Calendar.take(NoOfRecordsToDisplay))

from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date
from datetime import date
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType

# Hardcoded start and end dates
GeneratedDatesStartDate = "2023-04-01"  # Example: April 1st, 2023
HistoricalCalendar = "Gregorian"  # Example: Gregorian calendar

# # Curated Target Folder Path
CuratedADLSPath = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % ('trainsyn', 'synmishtrain', 'test' +"/" + "Dates")

#                                 FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriod""")

# Sample data
date1 = str(date(2023, 3, 31)) 
date2 = str(date(2022, 3, 31))

data = [(date1), (date2)]

# Specify schema with string type
schema = StructType([
    StructField("FiscalPeriodEndDate", StringType())
])

# Create DataFrame 
df = spark.createDataFrame(data, schema=schema)

df.createOrReplaceTempView("TempTable_FiscalPeriod") 

DF_StartEndDates = spark.sql("""
    SELECT 
      CAST(MIN(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS DATE) + INTERVAL 1 DAY AS FiscalStartDate,  
      CAST(MAX(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS DATE) + INTERVAL 1 DAY AS FiscalEndDate
    FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriod
""")

#                  .save(CuratedADLSPath)

# #Display Dataframe Result
# if Debug == True:
#     print("Total Records: " + str(DF_Calendar.count()))
#     display(DF_Calendar.take(NoOfRecordsToDisplay))

#Curated Target Folder Path
CuratedADLSPath = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (CleansedContainerName, CleansedStorageAccountName, CleansedRelativePath +"/" + "Dates")

DF_StartEndDates =spark.sql(f"""SELECT CAST("{GeneratedDatesStartDate}" AS Date) FiscalStartDate, CAST(MAX(FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS Date)+1 AS FiscalEndDate
                                FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriod""")

#Create List from DF_StartEndDates
DatesCollection = DF_StartEndDates.collect()

#Generate Date Ranges from Start & End Dates 
def DimDate_PeriodInDaysDateRange(start_date, end_date):
    for n in range(int((end_date - start_date).days)):
        yield start_date + timedelta(n)

#Initialize list to store dates between Start & End Date
List_DimDatePeriodInDaysDates = []

#Loop in DatesCollection and generate all days between Start & End Date
for row in DatesCollection:
    PeriodInDaysStartDate = row["FiscalStartDate"]
    PeriodInDaysEndDate =  row["FiscalEndDate"]
    for single_date in DimDate_PeriodInDaysDateRange(PeriodInDaysStartDate, PeriodInDaysEndDate):
        #Append single days to Period In Days Dates List
        List_DimDatePeriodInDaysDates.append(single_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

#Define the Dataframe from Period In Days Dates List
DF_PeriodInDaysDates = spark.createDataFrame(List_DimDatePeriodInDaysDates, StringType())
DF_PeriodInDaysDates.createOrReplaceTempView('FiscalDates')

#Define the Dataframe
GenDates = spark.sql(f"""SELECT FiscalPeriodStartDate,
                               FiscalPeriodEndDate,
                               Calendar,
                               FiscalYear,
                               PeriodName,
                               FiscalMonth,
                               FiscalQuarter,
                               Type, 
                               SyncStartDateTime
                        FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriod
                        UNION ALL
                        (SELECT distinct(date_add(last_day(add_months(Date(FD.value), -1 )),1)) FiscalPeriodStartDate,
                               LAST_DAY(FD.value) FiscalPeriodEndDate,
                               '{HistoricalCalendar}' AS Calendar,
                               CASE 
                                    WHEN month(FD.value) BETWEEN 7 AND 12 
                                        THEN CONCAT('FY', year(FD.value) +1)
                                    ELSE CONCAT('FY', year(FD.value)) 
                               END AS FiscalYear,

                               CASE 
                                    WHEN month(FD.value) BETWEEN 7 AND 12
                                        THEN CONCAT('Periode ', month(FD.value) - 6)
                                    ELSE CONCAT('Periode ', month(FD.value) + 6)
                               END AS PeriodName,

                               CASE 
                                    WHEN month(FD.value) BETWEEN 7 AND 12
                                        THEN month(FD.value) - 6
                                    ELSE month(FD.value) + 6
                               END AS FiscalMonth,
                               CASE 
                                    WHEN month(FD.value) BETWEEN 7 AND 9 
                                        THEN 1
                                    WHEN month(FD.value) BETWEEN 10 AND 12
                                        THEN 2
                                    WHEN month(FD.value) BETWEEN 1 AND 3
                                        THEN 3
                                    WHEN month(FD.value) BETWEEN 4 AND 6
                                        THEN 4
                               END AS FiscalQuarter,
                               1 AS Type,
                               current_timestamp() as SyncStartDateTime                               
                               FROM FiscalDates AS FD
                               WHERE FD.value < (Select MIN(FiscalPeriodStartDate) from TempTable_FiscalPeriod WHERE Calendar = '{HistoricalCalendar}'))
                               """)

#Register the Temp Table
GenDates.createOrReplaceTempView("TempTable_FiscalPeriodAdditionalDates")

#Define the Dataframe
DF_Calendar = spark.sql(f"""SELECT  
                                '-1' AS DateCode,
                                to_date('1900-01-01') AS Date,
                                to_date('1989-01-01') AS PreviousYearDate,
                                '190001' AS CalendarPeriod,
                                'Monday, January 1 1900' AS DateName,
                                '1900' AS CalendarYear,
                                'Year 1900' AS CalendarYearName,
                                '1900-Q1' AS CalendarQuarter,
                                'Quarter 1, 1900' AS CalendarQuarterName,
                                '01' AS CalendarMonth,
                                'January' AS MonthShortName,
                                'January, 1900' AS CalendarMonthName,
                                '01' AS CalendarWeek,
                                'Week 01, 1900' AS CalendarWeekName,
                                '001' AS CalendarDayOfYear,
                                'Day 001, 1900' AS CalendarDayOfYearName,
                                '01' AS DayOfMonth,
                                'Day 01' AS DayOfMonthName,
                                '1' AS DayOfWeek,
                                'Day 1' AS DayOfWeekName,
                                'Monday' AS Weekday,
                                '1900, 01' AS CalendarWeekOfYear,
                                'Week 01, 1900' AS CalendarWeekOfYearName,
                                '1900, 01' AS CalendarMonthOfYear,
                                'Month 01, 1900' AS CalendarMonthOfYearName,
                                '1900, 1' AS CalendarQuarterOfYear,
                                'Quarter 1, 1900' AS CalendarQuarterOfYearName,
                                '1900-H1' AS CalendarHalfYear,
                                '190001' AS FiscalPeriod,
                                '1900' AS FiscalYear,
                                'Fiscal Year 1900' AS FiscalYearName,
                                '1900-Q1' AS FiscalQuarter,
                                'Fiscal Quarter 1, 1900' AS FiscalQuarterName,
                                '01' AS FiscalMonth,
                                'January, 1900' AS FiscalMonthName,
                                '1900-H1' AS FiscalHalfYear,
                                '' AS Calendar
                        UNION ALL
                        SELECT  Calendar.DateCode,
                                to_date(Calendar.Date) AS Date,
                                ADD_MONTHS(to_date(Calendar.Date),-12) AS PreviousYearDate,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'),date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MM')) AS CalendarPeriod,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'EEEE'), ", " ,date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM'), " "  , date_format(Calendar.Date, 'd'),  " " , date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS DateName,
                                date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y') AS CalendarYear,
                                CONCAT("Year ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarYearName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), '-Q', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q')) AS CalendarQuarter,
                                CONCAT("Quarter ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarQuarterName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0',date_format(Calendar.Date, 'M')),2) AS CalendarMonth,
                                date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM') AS MonthShortName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y') ) AS CalendarMonthName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2) AS CalendarWeek,
                                CONCAT("Week ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2), ", ",date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarWeekName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('00', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'D')),3) AS CalendarDayOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Day ", RIGHT(CONCAT('00', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'D')),3), ", ",date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarDayOfYearName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'd')),2) AS DayOfMonth,
                                CONCAT("Day ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0', date_format(Calendar.Date, 'd')),2)) AS DayOfMonthName,
                                dayofweek(Calendar.Date) AS DayOfWeek,
                                CONCAT("Day ",dayofweek(Calendar.Date)) AS DayOfWeekName,
                                date_format(Calendar.Date, 'EEEE') AS Weekday,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'),', ',RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2)) AS CalendarWeekOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Week ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0', weekofyear(Calendar.Date)),2), ", " ,date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarWeekOfYearName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), ", ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0',date_format(Calendar.Date, 'M')),2)) AS CalendarMonthOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Month ", RIGHT(CONCAT('0',date_format(Calendar.Date, 'M')),2), ", ",date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y') ) AS CalendarMonthOfYearName,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q')) AS CalendarQuarterOfYear,
                                CONCAT("Quarter ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q'), ", ", date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y')) AS CalendarQuarterOfYearName,
                                CASE 
                                    WHEN int(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'q')) < 3
                                    THEN CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), '-H1')
                                    ELSE CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'y'), '-H2')
                                END AS CalendarHalfYear,
                                CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), right(CONCAT('0',FPO.FiscalMonth),2)) AS FiscalPeriod,
                                RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4) AS FiscalYear,
                                CONCAT("Fiscal Year ", RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4)) AS FiscalYearName,
                                CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), '-Q', FPO.FiscalQuarter ) AS FiscalQuarter,
                                CONCAT("Fiscal Quarter ", FPO.FiscalQuarter, ", ", RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4)) AS FiscalQuarterName,
                                RIGHT(CONCAT('0', FPO.FiscalMonth),2) AS FiscalMonth,
                                CONCAT(date_format(Calendar.Date, 'MMMM'),", ", RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4)) AS FiscalMonthName,
                                CASE 
                                    WHEN FPO.FiscalQuarter < 3
                                    THEN CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), '-H1')
                                    ELSE CONCAT(RIGHT(Calendar.FiscalYear,4), '-H2')
                                END AS FiscalHalfYear,
                                Calendar.Calendar AS Calendar
                        FROM 
                            (SELECT CONCAT(FPI.CALENDAR, '_' ,FD.value) AS DateCode,
                                    FPI.CALENDAR,
                                    FPI.FISCALYEAR,
                                    FD.value AS Date
                             FROM TempTable_FiscalPeriodAdditionalDates FPI
                             CROSS JOIN FiscalDates FD
                             WHERE FD.Value BETWEEN FPI.FiscalPeriodStartDate AND FPI.FiscalPeriodEndDate) AS Calendar
                             LEFT JOIN TempTable_FiscalPeriodAdditionalDates FPO
                                  ON Calendar.Date BETWEEN FPO.FiscalPeriodStartDate AND FPO.FiscalPeriodEndDate
                                  AND Calendar.Calendar = FPO.Calendar
                        """)

#Write cleansed data
DF_Calendar.write.format("delta")\
                 .mode("overwrite")\
                 .option("overwriteSchema", "false")\
                 .save(CuratedADLSPath)

#Display Dataframe Result
if Debug == True:
    print("Total Records: " + str(DF_Calendar.count()))
    display(DF_Calendar.take(NoOfRecordsToDisplay))
